attributes.action: Provide the electorate with an opportunity to vote in a referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: regarding the introduction of the sanction of imposition of the death penalty for a person convicted of child rape

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
